name: Angrymals
storyline: Ever heard of Worms and Angry Birds, two incredible games that made video game history? Angrymals is passionately inspired by them, and it mixes up some of their traits to deliver something totally new. Can you imagine playing Worms with the addition of 2D physics? Or challenging your friends on Angry Birds through fast-paced, real-time matches? And if we say there are tons of weapons to choose from, and you could even design your own defensive fortresses? You are just beginning to scratch the surface.
summary: Inspired by Worms and Angry Birds, this game let you challenge your friends online (player vs player) choosing your fortress, wierd weapons and animals with crazy special moves. It's a 2D slingshot turn based game.
